books.author: by Stephen King
books.description: Children with special talents are abducted and sequestered in an institution where the sinister staff seeks to extract their gifts through harsh methods.
books.name: THE INSTITUTE

books.author: by Margaret Atwood
books.description: In a sequel to “The Handmaid’s Tale,” old secrets bring three women together as the Republic of Gilead’s theocratic regime shows signs of decay.
books.name: THE TESTAMENTS

books.author: by Delia Owens
books.description: In a quiet town on the North Carolina coast in 1969, a young woman who survived alone in the marsh becomes a murder suspect.
books.name: WHERE THE CRAWDADS SING

books.author: by Craig Johnson
books.description: The 15th book in the Longmire series. Back from Mexico, Sheriff Longmire must deal with a wolf and a killer on the loose.
books.name: LAND OF WOLVES

books.author: by Donna Tartt
books.description: A painting smuggled out of the Metropolitan Museum of Art after a bombing becomes a boy’s prize, guilt and burden.
books.name: THE GOLDFINCH

books.author: by Margaret Atwood
books.description: In the Republic of Gilead’s dystopian future, men and women perform the services assigned to them.
books.name: THE HANDMAID'S TALE

books.author: by Stephen King
books.description: The fears of seven teenagers are rekindled in their adult lives by the terrifying title character. Originally published in 1986.
books.name: IT

books.author: by David Lagercrantz
books.description: Mikael Blomkvist helps Lisbeth Salander put her past behind her in the latest installment of Stieg Larsson's Millennium series.
books.name: THE GIRL WHO LIVED TWICE

books.author: by James Patterson and Howard Roughan
books.description: The second book in the Instinct series. When an act of terror strikes New York, Dr. Reinhart and Detective Needham go after a sociopath.
books.name: KILLER INSTINCT

books.author: by Heather Morris
books.description: A concentration camp detainee tasked with permanently marking fellow prisoners falls in love with one of them.
books.name: THE TATTOOIST OF AUSCHWITZ

books.author: by Heather Graham
books.description: The 29th book in the Krewe of Hunters series. Cheyenne Donegal and Andre Broussard overcome their personal misgivings to find a killer in the bayou.
books.name: THE STALKING

books.author: by J.D. Robb
books.description: The 49th book of the In Death series. Eve Dallas looks into the misdeeds of a wealthy businessman while a vigilante named Lady Justice uses disguises to avenge women who were wronged.
books.name: VENDETTA IN DEATH

books.author: by Joe Abercrombie
books.description: The Age of Madness series opens with a war erupting during a time of change.
books.name: A LITTLE HATRED

books.author: by Lisa Wingate
books.description: A South Carolina lawyer learns about the questionable practices of a Tennessee orphanage.
books.name: BEFORE WE WERE YOURS

books.author: by Clive Cussler and Jack Du Brul
books.description: The 11th book in the Isaac Bell series. Dirk Pitt finds a document that brings a mystery from 1911 back to life.
books.name: THE TITANIC SECRET
